title: Amazon SQS to Amazon Timestream using Amazon EventBridge Pipes
description: This pattern shows how to ingest data into Amazon Timestream from an SQS queue via EventBridge Pipes.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project shows how to send data to Amazon Timestream directly from SQS. This pattern uses EventBridge Pipes to connect SQS and Timestream together.
The pattern creates an Amazon SQS queue, a Timestream table, Cloudwatch LogGroup, IAM Policy and an EventBridge Pipe.

bullets.text: Send Amazon SQS data to Timestream

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
Delete the stack: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name STACK_NAME.
